song_lyrics: Sonā sāgar chhal chhal chhalake, nīlam ṭhāmoṭhām,
Pragaṭ maḷyā chhe Sahajānand Hari, pāmyā Akṣhardhām...
Sonā sāgar... 1
Puruṣhottam ahī pragaṭ sadā chhe, Akṣharmā Akṣharmā,
E ja guṇātīt paramparā rahī, bhūtaḷmā bhūtaḷmā,
Vande Shrī Puruṣhottamam cha paramam dhāmākṣharam gnānadam
Vande Prāgajī bhakta-meva-managham brahmaswarūpam mudā |
Vande Yagnapuruṣhdās charaṇam Shrī Yogīrājam tathā
Vande shrī Pramukham Mahanta-guṇinam mokṣhāya bhaktyā sadā ||
Puruṣhattam ahī pragaṭ sadā chhe, Akṣharmā Akṣharmā,
Bhagatjī Shāstrījī Yogī guruvarmā,
Āj maḷyā chhe Pramukh Swarūpe ā bhavmā,
Pramukh swarūpe ā bhavmā,
Puṇya amārā agaṇit raṭīe, Swāminārāyaṇ nām,
Pragaṭ maḷyā chhe Sahajānand Hari, pāmyā Akṣhardhām....
Sonā sāgar... 2
He kṛupānidhān mokṣha-dātā, he kṛupānidhān mokṣha-dātā,
Karuṇāmay chhe tamāru nām, he kṛupānidhān mokṣha-dātā,
Sharaṇāgat saghaḷā jīvone tame tāranār,
Karīe koṭi koṭi praṇām, karīe koṭi koṭi praṇām,
He kṛupānidhān mokṣha-dātā, he kṛupānidhān mokṣha-dātā... 3
Baso uramāhī Ghanashyām dhām,
Akṣhar tum pyāre vicharat bhūmīpe,
Tum Harivar pragaṭe am kāraṇe,
Baso uramāhī Ghanashyām dhām,
Baso uramāhī Ghanashyām dhām,
Charaṇ-kamal bhaju Pramukh tamārā,
Nagar nagar ghar ghar faranārā,
Janma maraṇ dukh meṭanhārā
Ang ang Harivar dharanārā,
Baso uramāhī Ghanashyām dhām.... 4
Ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re, ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re,
Ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re, ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re,
Rang tamāro lāgyo, rang tamāro lāgyo,
Pramukh Swāmī... haiyāmā bhakti jagāḍī re lol,
Duniyānī māyā melī, duniyānī māyā melī,
Pramukh Swāmī....
Māyā tamārī lagāḍī re lol, māyā tamārī lagāḍī re lol,
Rang tamāro lāgyo, rang tamāro lāgyo,
Pramukh Swāmī... haiyāmā...
Ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re gulāl, ūḍe re gulāl ūḍe ūḍe re gulāl..... 5
Chūkavī shakāy na ṛuṇ āpaṇu, dharīe janam anant,
Tav charaṇomā vandan karīe, he guruhari bhagavant,
Dīvaḍā pragaṭāvīe, āratī utārīe,
Fulaḍā varasāvīe sant,
Svīkāro karoḍo vandan amārā, he guruhari bhagavant,
He guruhari bhagavant, he guruhari bhagavant....
He guruhari bhagavant, he guruhari bhagavant.... 6
title: Sonā sāgar chhal chhal chhalake

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3077: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
